{{title|operator&lt;&lt;{{small|(std::experimental::basic_string_view)}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/basic_string_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header | experimental/string_view}}
{{dcl | since=libfund_ts |
template &lt;class CharT, class Traits&gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;(std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os, 
               std::basic_string_view &lt;CharT, Traits&gt; v);
}}
{{dcl end}}

Equivalent to {{c|os &lt;&lt; v.to_string()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | os | a character output stream}}
{{par | v | the view to be inserted}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{tt|os}}
